sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-dialog
    width="350px"
    persistent 
    v-model="registerDialog">
        <v-btn accent slot="activator" class="primary">
            {{userIsRegistered ? 'Unsubscribe' : 'Subscribe'}}
        </v-btn>
        <v-card>
            <v-container>
                <v-layout row wrap>
                    <v-flex xs12>
                        <v-card-title v-if="userIsRegistered">Unsubscribe from this service</v-card-title>
                        <v-card-title v-else>Subscribe to this service</v-card-title>
                    </v-flex>
                </v-layout>
                <v-divider></v-divider>
                <v-layout row wrap>
                    <v-flex xs12>
                        <v-card-text>You can always chabge your decision later on.</v-card-text>
                    </v-flex>
                </v-layout>
                <v-layout row wrap>
                    <v-flex xs12>
                        <v-card-actions>
                            <v-btn 
                            class="red--text darken-1" 
                            flat 
                            @click="registerDialog = false">Cancel</v-btn>
                            <v-btn
                            class="green--text darken-1"
                            flat
                            @click="onAgree">Confirm</v-btn>
                        </v-card-actions>
                    </v-flex>
                </v-layout>
            </v-container>
        </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    props: ['serviceId'],
    data(){
        return{
            registerDialog: false
        }
    },
    computed: {
        userIsRegistered(){
            return this.$store.getters.user.registeredServices.findIndex(serviceId => {
                return serviceId === this.serviceId
            }) >= 0
        }
    },
    methods: {
        onAgree(){
            if (this.userIsRegistered) {
                this.$store.dispatch('unregisterUserForService', this.serviceId)
            }else{
                this.$store.dispatch('registerUserForService', this.serviceId)
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>
